channel.title: How do i make it so only my client can connect to the server
channel.description: Does anyone know? I've googled it and found 1 thing but it only worked with winterlove. Im using pk planet 317.

item.title: How do i make it so only my client can connect to the server
item.dc:creator: @rawr_i_am_scary rawr i am scary
item.description:
@rawr_i_am_scary wrote:

sigh… The sadness that has come upon us

You turn off your no-ip and change in client.java your ip to “localhost”

Read full topic
